data.title: Distance between Nangal and Kalka is 79 KM
data.text:
DistanceBetween2.Com

Nangal to Kalka distance, location, road map and direction

Nangal is located in India at the longitude of 76.38 and latitude of 31.38. Kalka is located in India at the longitude of 76.93 and latitude of 30.84 .

Driving Distance : 92 KM and 916 meters / 57.7 miles.

Straight Line Distance : 80 KM and 200 meters / 49.8 miles.

Travel time : 1 hours and 42 minutes.

Direction and bearing : South East side, 139 degree.

Distance between Nangal and Kalka

The total straight line distance between Nangal and Kalka is 80 KM (kilometers) and 200 meters. The miles based distance from Nangal to Kalka is 49.8 miles. This is a straight line distance and so most of the time the actual travel distance between Nangal and Kalka may be higher or vary due to curvature of the road .

The driving distance or the travel distance between Nangal to Kalka is 92 KM and 916 meters. The mile based, road distance between these two travel point is 57.7 miles.

Time Difference between Nangal and Kalka

The sun rise time difference or the actual time difference between Nangal and Kalka is 0 hours , 2 minutes and 12 seconds. Note: Nangal and Kalka time calculation is based on UTC time of the particular city. It may vary from country standard time , local time etc.

Nangal To Kalka travel time

Nangal is located around 80 KM away from Kalka so if you travel at the consistent speed of 50 KM per hour you can reach Kalka in 1 hours and 42 minutes. Your Kalka travel time may vary due to your bus speed, train speed or depending upon the vehicle you use.

Nangal to Kalka Bus

Bus timings from Nangal to Kalka is around 1 hours and 42 minutes when your bus maintains an average speed of sixty kilometer per hour over the course of your journey. The estimated travel time from Nangal to Kalka by bus may vary or it will take more time than the above mentioned time due to the road condition and different travel route. Travel time has been calculated based on crow fly distance so there may not be any road or bus connectivity also.

Bus fare from Nangal to Kalka

may be around Rs.70.

Midway point between Nangal To Kalka

Mid way point or halfway place is a center point between source and destination location. The mid way point between Nangal and Kalka is situated at the latitude of 31.108917013838 and the longitude of 76.657706749686. If you need refreshment you can stop around this midway place, after checking the safety,feasibility, etc.

Nangal To Kalka road map

Kalka is located nearly South East side to Nangal. The bearing degree from Nangal To Kalka is 139 Â° degree. The given South East direction from Nangal is only approximate. The given google map shows the direction in which the blue color line indicates road connectivity to Kalka .
